body.p: Baseline Aircraft Summary (Pre-modification) information is taken from Boeing B737 Baseline ELA Documents D285A018-65, D285A018-65 Enclosure and JET Airways ELA statement. The existing aircraft load is based on a “HOLD & LAND” condition, which is the maximum loading condition for this aircraft. In addition, both bus and bus types are listed. The following is a description of the Electrical Power System in the Boeing 737NG series aircraft.
